title: Chandrika Ruby Diamond Stud Earrings - Kundan Kamal
materials: G Color). Features authentic Hyderabadi Kundan setting for the diamonds.
features: A circular stud design reminiscent of a blooming lotus (Kamal), these earrings feature a central ruby surrounded by concentric layers of diamonds set in a Kundan style. The openwork design enhances the sparkle. The setting showcases impeccable craftsmanship typical of Hyderabadi jewelry.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of regal elegance. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: Exquisite Kundan craftsmanship combined with the brilliance of diamonds and the rich color of rubies makes this a truly unique and eye-catching piece. The lotus design symbolizes purity and prosperity, making it an auspicious choice. Durable and timeless, designed to be cherished for generations.
